sentences.sContent: restrictions on press freedom, such as libel laws
sentences.sCn: 诽谤法之类对新闻自由的限制

synos.tran: 诽谤罪；诋毁；毁坏名誉的东西；控诉书

remMethod.val: lib (文字) + el → (用文字) 诽谤

words.tran: 诽谤的；损害名誉的（等于libelous）

trans.tranCn: 诽谤罪；诋毁；毁坏名誉的东西；控诉书
trans.tranOther: when someone writes or prints untrue statements about someone so that other people could have a bad opinion of them
to write or print a libel against someone
